article_title: Anthem, Cigna Shareholders Approve Merger As Antitrust Hurdles Await

article_metadata.description: Shareholders of Anthem (ANTM) and Cigna (CI) approved by overwhelming margins the merger of the two health plans into the nation’s largest health insurance company. Anthem’s $54 billion purchase of Cigna still needs approval of federal regulators. Groups representing medical care providers like the American Medical Association and the American Hospital [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
